city.name: Tangier
city.title: Tangier City Pass
city.subtitle: Your gateway to exploring Morocco's fascinating crossroads between Europe and Africa

features.name: Historic Sites
features.description: Access to 10+ historical and cultural landmarks

features.name: Public Transport
features.description: Unlimited rides on city buses and petit taxis

features.name: Guided Tours
features.description: 2 guided walking tours of the Kasbah and Medina included

features.name: Strait Experience
features.description: One complimentary Strait of Gibraltar boat tour

features.name: Cave Access
features.description: Entry to Hercules Cave and other natural attractions

features.name: Shopping Discounts
features.description: 15% off at participating artisan shops and markets

benefits.title: Skip-the-Line Access
benefits.description: Save time with priority entry at most attractions. Simply show your pass at the priority entrance and walk right in.

benefits.title: Unlimited Public Transport
benefits.description: Hop on and off buses and use petit taxis with ease during your pass validity. No need to buy separate tickets.

benefits.title: Guided Walking Tours
benefits.description: Join our daily walking tours led by expert local guides who will share fascinating stories about Tangier's multicultural history.

benefits.title: Mobile Pass Option
benefits.description: Keep your pass on your smartphone - no need to print anything. Works offline too!

benefits.title: Exclusive Discounts
benefits.description: Show your pass to receive special discounts at participating caf√©s, restaurants, and additional experiences.

usageSteps.title: Purchase & Download
usageSteps.description: Buy your pass online and download the PDF or install our mobile app to access your digital pass.

usageSteps.title: Activation
usageSteps.description: Your pass activates automatically the first time you use it at any attraction or on public transport.

usageSteps.title: Show & Scan
usageSteps.description: Present your pass (digital or printed) at each attraction entrance or to transport operators. They'll scan the QR code for validation.

usageSteps.title: Enjoy!
usageSteps.description: Make the most of your pass by visiting as many attractions as you can during your chosen duration.

faqs.question: When does my pass expire?
faqs.answer: Your pass is valid for consecutive days from first use. For example, a 3-day pass activated on Monday at 2pm will be valid until Thursday at 2pm.

faqs.question: Can I visit attractions multiple times?
faqs.answer: Most attractions allow one-time entry with the pass. However, you can use public transport unlimited times during the validity period.

faqs.question: What happens if I don't use all the days on my pass?
faqs.answer: Unused days are not refundable. We recommend selecting a duration that matches your planned stay in Tangier.

faqs.question: Can I share my pass with friends or family?
faqs.answer: No, each pass is valid for one person only. Each traveler needs their own pass.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for the pass?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can download our app to store and access your pass digitally. It works offline once downloaded.

faqs.question: Are guided tours in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, our guided tours are available in English, French, Spanish, and Arabic. Please check the schedule for specific language timings.

itineraries.title: International Tangier
